# title

**Instance Property**

The title of the scanned document.

## Declaration

```swift
var title: String { get }
```

## Reading the scanned document

- **pageCount**: The number of pages in the scanned document.
- **imageOfPage(at:)**: Requests the image of a page at a specified index.

items.description: The number of pages in the scanned document.
items.name: pageCount

items.description: Requests the image of a page at a specified index.
items.name: imageOfPage(at:)

title: title
